code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import{coursesApi}from'services/courses';var initialState={currentPath:'/instructor/courses',profile:null};export var instructorSlice=createSlice({name:'instructor',initialState:initialState,reducers:{setCurrentPath:function setCurrentPath(state,action){state.currentPath=action.payload;}},extraReducers:function extraReducers(builder){builder.addMatcher(coursesApi.endpoints.editInstructorInfo.matchFulfilled,function(state,_ref){var payload=_ref.payload;state.profile=payload;}).addMatcher(coursesApi.endpoints.fetchInstructorInfo.matchFulfilled,function(state,_ref2){var payload=_ref2.payload;state.profile=payload;});}});var setCurrentPath=instructorSlice.actions.setCurrentPath;export{setCurrentPath};export default instructorSlice.reducer;export var selectCurrentPath=function selectCurrentPath(state){return state.instructor.currentPath;};export var selectInstructor=function selectInstructor(state){return state.instructor.profile;};
